author: Sim Sze Wei
description: Sim Sze Wei says of his drink, “Golden Eight is inspired by the hardships and challenges along my journey as a bartender and the untameable spirit of BACARDÍ rum. I am pursuing my belief with passion and determination; innovating a new category of rum cocktail with no homemade ingredients.”
name: Golden Eight
recipeIngredient: 20 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
